title: New Year, New Website
content:
# A time for change...

![Setting sun on a new day and a new year](/images/uploads/00000xtr_00000_burst20180525212222.jpg)

I'd like to take the opportunity in 2022 to revamp myself.

I want to further myself in my career and take personal projects to new heights.

I want to make blogging a more regular effort, not only to cement information into my mind but also showcase my independent learning and training efforts.

Here's to an exciting new year!



![]()
